title: Radio: UX I and you do
code:
<gds-flex padding="xl">
  <gds-radio-group label="How do you want the goods delivered?">
    <gds-radio
      label="Home to me by courier, 2â€“3 days."
      value="1"
      checked
    ></gds-radio>
    <gds-radio
      label="Home to me by express courier, 1 day."
      value="2"
    ></gds-radio>
    <gds-radio label="I pick up at the store." value="3"></gds-radio>
    <gds-radio label="I collect from a parcel locker." value="4"></gds-radio>
  </gds-radio-group>
</gds-flex>
